item.description:
For our January meetup, we're going to welcome attendees of the Linked Data Product Development Lab.

This is a one-week intensive program in which attendees will learn how to build--and then actually build--Linked Data applications with commercial potential.

We've invited attendees of the program to join us at our Tuesday evening get-together and to present to us their ideas for new Linked Data applications, at which point we'll be able to ask questions and offer suggestions regarding the idea, business cases, choice of technologies, choice of tools, etc.

This will be a bit different from our usual fare, but I think it will be quite interesting and fun for everyone involved. Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Star Conference Room. 4th Floor, Stata Center
item.name: The Cambridge Semantic Web January Meetup
